hooks.command: FILE=$(echo $CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT | jq -r '.file_path // .path // empty'); if echo "$FILE" | grep -qE '\.(ts|tsx)$'; then cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" && pnpm typecheck 2>&1 | head -30 || npx tsc --noEmit 2>&1 | head -20 || true; fi

hooks.prompt: Verify subagent completed ALL tasks. Check: 1) All assigned work done? 2) All files created? 3) Works on BOTH web AND mobile if applicable? 4) No TODO/FIXME placeholders? If incomplete: {"decision": "block", "reason": "Continue: [specific instruction]"}. If complete: {"decision": "allow"}
